response.original_title: The Woodsmaster Volume 04 Primitive Navigation And Wilderness Travel Techniques
response.overview: You'll learn the Ottomani pocket Sun compass. Night navigation, Shadow stick tricks, "Self Tracking", The Vietnamese Montegnards "bu cat" walking stick technique, the Plainsman stride and lock step, more techniques for telling direction, distance and height, trail travel energy saving techniques, hydration information and a ton moreâ€¦ Including the beginnings of the Lithic arts (Stone tool making)!
